challenge.title: Challenge 27
challenge.author: Bhanudev Chaluvadi Spyros Gasteratos
challenge.description: The archaeological department has found a book which is hundreds of years old. This book named 'The Treasure' tells of a treasure of immense value.The book also contains an encrypted text, which might help in finding the key to the treasure. You have been entrusted the responsibility to decipher it.
